TextView.android:text: - Take Note of the Aerodrome information in a piece of paper/scratch paper.
- Be mindful with words in color, they are necessary in Flight Progressive Strips.
Pilot Requests ATC Clearance for Departure
Cool Red 612, Clearance Delivery, Go Ahead
We are an Airbus 330 (A330), requesting clearance to Mactan, FL330.
- Cool red is the Call sign for Philippine Air Asia thus GPA is the three letter ICAO code.
- 0754 time where the Pilot requested a clearance. (Be mindful on time)
- CD now calls ACC to request ATC Clearance for Cool red 612.
Clearance Delivery requests ATC Clearance from ACC
Clearance Delivery, Manila Control, go ahead.
Request ATC clearance for Cool Red 612, Airbus 330, destination Mactan Cebu, requesting FL330.
Cool Red 612 cleared Mactan International Airport via Econ A324 W9, flight plan route, climb and maintain FL150 until further advise.
Cool Red 612 cleared Mactan Cebu International Airport via Econ A324 W9, flight plan route, climb and maintain FL150 until further advise.
- Route of flight – Econ A324 W9 | FPR – Flight Plan Route.
- OS - Wire sign of person who gave the ATC Clearance.
- IH – Wire sign of the person who received the ATC Clearance.
Clearance Delivery relays ATC Clearance to Pilot
Cool red 612 cleared Mactan Cebu International airport via Econ A324 W9, climb and maintain FL330 on (Econ) 2A departure.
Cool red 612 cleared Mactan Cebu airport via Econ A324 W9, will climb and maintain FL330 on (Econ) 2A departure.
- 0759 – time when clearance is relayed to pilot|minutes only.
- IH - Wiresign of the person who relayed the clearance to the pilot.
- Be mindful of the time when Approach release the aircraft.
- In this case, 0808 is the time of release message.
Revised/Additional Instructions for Aircraft for Departure
Revise, for APG612, straight out departure upon airborne to climb 3000.
- Don’t forget to put a check mark beside the airborne time.
Approach, APG612, airborne runway 06, on straight out departure climbing 3000.
APG612, Approach, climb 5000, after passing 3000, turn left, intercept and track out R117, report when established.
Roger, climb 5000, after passing 3000, turn left, intercept and track out R117, will report when established.
Approach, APG612, now established R117 of Manila VOR, maintaining 5000.
APG612, request DME from Manila VOR
APG612, we are 15 DME from Manila VOR.
APG612, Approach, climb flight level 150 until further advised, after passing 10000, turn right direct Econ
Roger, leaving 5000 for flight level 150UFA, after passing 10000, will turn right direct Econ
- Don’t forget to note the DME and time in order to keep separation.
- 0823 is the time APG612 reported on 15 DME.
- Keep note of the minimum FL the aircraft must reach in order to cruise through the airspace.
APG612, approaching Econ climbing FL150UFA, release.
- 0835 is the time App released APG612 to ACC.
